Html: Is there a roadmap/timeline on adding new controls to themes?  ListView, DataGrid, DatePicker, Calendar, etc.?   Are the themes limited to controls that are in both Silverlight and WPF?  I'm assuming that since this is titled WPF Themes, it could eventually be for all controls in WPF???  Keep up good work.

Hi shaggygi,

I have no official timeline yet... but I do think that all the native wpf controls (not the wpf toolkit stuff) should be all in, in the next month or two! WPF toolkit stuff (like datepicker, calendar etc) by Q3 of 2009?

Regards,

Rudi
I will try and update the homepage with a "official" timeline!
This sounds very good, will look forward to the DockPanel style :-)
